As Noah notes, PUT is preferred if you want to perform a RESTful replace 
of the server-side file.

But just FYI, if you were trying to mimic the form as available in the 
browser-targeted UI, you would need to add a '?format=textarea' 
query-string to the URL. That's what triggers the rendering as an 
editable form, or accept of a POSTed new text value.

- Gordon @ IA
